summary.para: Registers one or more component categories. Each component category consists of a CATID and a list of locale-dependent description strings.

param.name: cCategories
param.para: The number of component categories to be registered.

param.name: rgCategoryInfo
param.para: An array of structures, one for each category to be registered. By providing the same CATID for multiple CATEGORYINFO structures, multiple locales can be registered for the same component category.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

description.para: One or more arguments are incorrect.

remarks.para: This method can only be called by the owner of a category, usually as part of the installation or de-installation of the operating system or application.

summary.para: Registers the class as implementing one or more component categories.

param.name: cCategories
param.para: The number of categories to be associated as category identifiers for the class.

param.name: rgcatid
param.para: An array of CATIDs to associate as category identifiers for the class.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

description.para: One or more arguments are incorrect.

remarks.para: In case of an error, this method does not ensure that the registry is restored to the state prior to the call. This method can only be called by the owner of a class, usually as part of the installation of the component.

summary.para: Registers the class as requiring one or more component categories.

param.name: cCategories
param.para: The number of category CATIDs to be associated as category identifiers for the class.

param.name: rgcatid
param.para: An array of CATIDs to be associated as category identifiers for the class.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

description.para: One or more arguments are incorrect.

remarks.para: In case of an error, this method does not ensure that the registry is restored to the state prior to the call. This method can only be called by the owner of a class, usually as part of the installation of the component.

summary.para: Removes the registration of one or more component categories. Each component category consists of a CATID and a list of locale-dependent description strings.

param.name: cCategories
param.para: The number of categories to be removed.

param.name: rgcatid
param.para: The CATIDs of the categories to be removed.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

description.para: One or more arguments are incorrect.

remarks.para: This method will be successful even if one or more of the category IDs specified are not registered. This method can only be called by the owner of a category, usually as part of the installation or de-installation of the operating system or application.
This method does not remove the component category tags from individual classes. To do this, use the method.

summary.para: Removes one or more implemented category identifiers from a class.

param.name: cCategories
param.para: The number of category CATIDs to be removed.

param.name: rgcatid
param.para: An array of CATIDs that are to be removed. Only the category IDs specified in this array are removed.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

description.para: One or more arguments are incorrect.

remarks.para: In case of an error, this method does not ensure that the registry is restored to the state prior to the call. This method will be successful even if one or more of the category IDs specified are not registered for the class. This method can only be called by the owner of a class, usually as part of the de-installation of the component.

summary.para: Removes one or more required category identifiers from a class.

param.name: cCategories
param.para: The number of category CATIDs to be removed.

param.name: rgcatid
param.para: An array of CATIDs that are to be removed. Only the category IDs specified in this array are removed.

returns.para: This method can return the following values.

description.para: One or more arguments are incorrect.

remarks.para: In case of an error, this method does not ensure that the registry is restored to the state prior to the call. This method will be successful even if one or more of the category IDs specified are not registered for the class.

summary.para: Provides methods for registering and unregistering component category information in the registry. This includes both the human-readable names of categories and the categories implemented/required by a given component or class.
